articles.description: The 5G iPhone 12 could cost hundreds less than the Galaxy S20, putting even more pressure on Samsung
articles.content:
A lot of people poke fun of Apple for the 'Apple Tax' it places on its products, but if the latest iPhone 12 rumors prove true it's Samsung's flagship phones that will look overpriced.

articles.title: The Best Viking Games to Prepare You For Assassin's Creed Valhalla - IGN - IGN
